title: Universe/Frames/PointOem
description: Configuration for PointOem points in frames plugin

pointMapping.description: Custom point mapping to be used to define the frames name of the OEM centres. There is already some default mappings that are applied apriori.

axesMapping.description: Custom axes mapping to be used to define the frames name of the OEM axes. There is already some default mappings that are applied apriori.
